analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x919362f32f37364ccd6972aac8b889d918dc59be.sol:
	Contract MDZAToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x919362f32f37364ccd6972aac8b889d918dc59be.sol#155-156)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0x919362f32f37364ccd6972aac8b889d918dc59be.sol#38-39) is not in mixedCase
